uk.ac.liv.auction.core
Class NPricingPolicy

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.core.NPricingPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, PricingPolicy, Parameterizable, Resetable
public class NPricingPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements PricingPolicy, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, Parameterizable

A discriminatory pricing policy that uses the average of the last n pair of bid and ask prices leading to transactions as the clearing price. In case of the price falls out of the range between the current bid and ask, the nearest boundary is used.

Parameters

base .n
int >= 1 		(the number of latest successful shout pairs used to determine next clearing price)

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Jinzhong Niu
